pkgmetadata.longdescription: WMFS (Window Manager From Scratch) is a lightweight and highly configurable tiling window manager for X. It can be configured with a configuration file, supports Xft (media-libs/freetype) fonts and is compliant with the Extended Window Manager Hints (EWMH) specifications, Xinerama and Xrandr. WMFS can be driven with Vi based commands (ViWMFS). Optional media-libs/imlib2 support allow WMFS to draw image instead text everywhere you want with a simple sequence.

use.flag: Enable support for the Xrandr extension
